SEARCH
Package CAMSv2

Class View

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
StaffView, StudentView
public abstract class View extends Object
This View An abstract class representing a generic user interface view. Provides methods for displaying various messages and information on the console.
